content: What popular video game franchise includes titles like 'Breath of the Wild' and 'Ocarina of Time'?

The popular video game franchise that includes titles like 'Breath of the Wild' and 'Ocarina of Time' is The Legend of Zelda, developed by Nintendo. The series is known for its iconic protagonist, Link, and his adventures in the fantasy world of Hyrule, where he battles the recurring antagonist Ganon to save Princess Zelda. The games are celebrated for their innovative gameplay, storytelling, and world-building, making The Legend of Zelda one of the most influential and beloved franchises in video game history.
